#VAR var canal = npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_ALLEYS_CANAL_CROSSING) || npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_CANAL) || npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_CANAL_END); #ENDVAR #IF(pc.hasCompanions())

With [com.name] by your side, you find yourself [pc.walking] down yet another of Dominion's twisting alleyways, the eerie silence broken only by the occasional crash of arcane thunder high above you. There are many hiding places for a would-be attacker to conceal themselves in, and sure enough, as you pass a particularly dark doorway, a figure suddenly leaps out at you. Thankfully, as you were taking care to be alert, you quickly step backwards and manage to avoid a punch aimed at your stomach.

[com.speech(Hey!)] [com.name] calls out, stepping forwards to stand by your side and confront this unknown assailant.

As the two of you get a better look at the mysterious figure, you see that [npc.sheIs] [npc.a_fullRace(true)]. Looking up at [npc.her] [npc.face+], you see a desperately hungry look in [npc.her] [npc.eyes], and you know that the arcane thunder has driven [npc.herHim] into a state of uncontrollable lust. [npc.She] looks determined to claim both you and [com.name] as [npc.her] prizes, and is ready to fight the two of you in order to claim your bodies.

[npc.speech(Come on now, there's no need for any violence!)] [npc.she] teases, [npc.her] voice dripping with lustful desperation as [npc.she] takes a step forwards. [npc.speech(Just surrender! Come on! I need a good fuck right now!)]

The arcane storm, combined with your powerful aura, has filled [npc.herHim] with a wild lust, and, #IF(game.isNonConEnabled()) knowing that defeat will result in the two of you being raped by this horny [npc.race], both you and [com.name] ready yourselves for a fight. #ELSE knowing that defeat will result in this horny [npc.race] wanting to have sex with the two of you, both you and [com.name] ready yourselves for a fight. #ENDIF

#ELSE

Thankfully, as you were taking care to be alert, you quickly step backwards and manage to avoid a punch aimed at your stomach.

Turning to face the assailant, you see [npc.a_fullRace(true)] grinning devilishly at you. There's no mistaking that hungry look in [npc.her] [npc.eyes], and you know that the arcane thunder has driven [npc.herHim] into a state of uncontrollable lust. [npc.She] looks determined to claim you as [npc.her] prize, and is ready to fight you in order to claim your body.

The arcane storm, combined with your powerful aura, has filled [npc.herHim] with a wild lust, and you have a good idea of what [npc.she] wants to do with you. #IF(game.isNonConEnabled()) Knowing that defeat will result in being raped by this horny [npc.race], you ready yourself for a fight. #ELSE Knowing that defeat will result in this horny [npc.race] wanting to have sex with you, you ready yourself for a fight. #ENDIF

#ENDIF

#VAR var canal = npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_ALLEYS_CANAL_CROSSING) || npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_CANAL) || npc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType().equals(PLACE_TYPE_DOMINION_CANAL_END); var companions = pc.hasCompanions(); #ENDVAR

Just as you suspected, as you cautiously pass a collection of leafy bushes growing on one side of the path, a shadowy figure leaps out, blocking your path! You instantly recognise the [npc.fullRace(true)], and you jump back into a fighting stance as you expect this encounter to be much the same as the last one. #ELSE Knowing that [npc.name(a)] is prowling around this area, you make sure to stay on high alert, carefully checking each and every dark corner and recess as you walk through the twisting passages.
